directions: Combine first 5 ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a 14-ounce beverage glass. Top with soda and garnish with a lemon wedge. Serve with a tall straw.
ingredients: 1/2-ounce Triple Sec (recommended: Hiram Walker Triple Sec)
3 ounces sour mix (recommended: Finest Call Sour Mix)
title: Long Island Iced Tea (LIT)
